      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean allowedToMove()
      Checks if enemy is allowed to move by comparing allowedToMove to allowedToMoveMax, if false increases allowedToMove by one.
      boolean enemyCanShoot()
      Creates a random number and compares it to shooting chance, if random is smaller returns true

      int getLocationY()

      Sets enemy status to dead

      Checks if the enemy is trying to cross the edge of the arena.

      boolean isAlive()
      Returns enemy status.
      void move()
      Tries to move enemy right or left based on boolean movingRight.
      void moveDown()
      moves enemy downward 2 * ARENA_STEPSIZE
      private void moveLeft()
      Moves the enemy left if movingRight = false.
      private void moveRight()
      Moves the enemy right if movingRight = true.
      void setEnemyShootingChance(double chance) 
      void setMoveSpeed(int s)

      • hitEdgeRight

        public boolean hitEdgeRight()
        Checks if the enemy is trying to cross the edge of the arena. If at right edge and going right, changes movement direction and moves enemy downwards.
        Returns:
        boolean true if enemy is at right edge
        See Also:
        moveDown()

      • hitEdgeLeft

        public boolean hitEdgeLeft()
        Checks if the enemy is trying to cross the edge of the arena. If at left edge and going left, changes movement direction and moves enemy downwards.
        Returns:
        boolean true if enemy is at left edge
        See Also:
        moveDown()

        public boolean allowedToMove()
